question: Which Indian state has passed ‘Krishi Upad Mandi (Amendment) Bill 2020’, to negate Centre’s Agricultural bill?
explanation:
Chhattisgarh Assembly has recently passed an amendment Bill to negate the Centre’s recent agriculture laws.
The state assembly passed Chhattisgarh Krishi Upad Mandi (Amendment) Bill 2020, which gives powers to the state government to regulate all agricultural produce markets. It also makes provision for establishment of an electronic trading place.
